## RestExplorerConfig type

Options to configure API Explorer UI

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RestExplorerConfig = {
    path?: string;
    useSelfHostedSpec?: false;
    swaggerThemeFile?: string;
    indexTemplatePath?: string;
    indexTitle?: string;
};
```
